thread.title: Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar’s ‘relaxing’ in an infinity pool photo goes viral. It’s a must watch!
thread.title_full: Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar’s ‘relaxing’ in an infinity pool photo goes viral. It’s a must watch!

author: FE Online
title: Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar’s ‘relaxing’ in an infinity pool photo goes viral. It’s a must watch!
text:
India news Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar’s ‘relaxing’ in an infinity pool photo goes viral. It’s a must watch! Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar’s ‘relaxing’ in an infinity pool photo goes viral. It’s a must watch! Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar seems to be enjoying to the fullest these days! His photo, chilling in an infinity pool, is being liked and going viral on social media. By: FE Online | Published: February 24, 2017 2:34 PM Laxmikant Parsekar uploaded a photo on his Facebook page on February 23. The first caption, which accompanied Parsekar’s now-viral photo, quizzed his followers playfully. 
Goa CM Laxmikant Parsekar seems to be enjoying to the fullest these days! And why not, after 40 constituencies in Goa went to polls on February 4, the results of which are scheduled to be declared six hours after the counting of votes on March 11, use Pehle 1 vacation to Banta hai boss! His photo, chilling in an infinity pool, is being liked and going viral on social media. And believe us, after looking at the photo, you would not realise that it is the Goa CM! 
Laxmikant Parsekar uploaded a photo on his Facebook page on February 23. The first caption, which accompanied Parsekar’s now-viral photo, quizzed his followers playfully. “Relaxing after elections. Guess who? Guess where?” However, this was enough for his critics to have a go at him. “Soon u will rest forever,” said Ankit Salgaonkar on his timeline. While others like Rahul Matias de Lemos suggested that the Chief Minister should “develop six pack abs”. Soon after the criticism, the photo caption was edited to read “Communing with nature. A refreshing experience”. 
Not all who commented were trolls though, with many well-wishers also stating that the brief holiday which Parsekar was currently enjoying along with his family was a deserving one, especially after a gruelling election campaign. 
While the minister did not reveal where he is, many in the comments on the post have guessed Wildernest Resort in Goa’s Chorla Ghats . Please Wait while comments are loading...
